participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and caring, Emily loves spending time outdoors and enjoys the company of her dog.
participant_1.background: i have a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Energetic and nostalgic, Jordan enjoys dancing and reminiscing about his childhood hobbies.
participant_2.background: i love new kids on the block. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s. i take dance lessons once a week. my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite.
